catalog_script_client.name: Populate WorkJam Requestor Info V4

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_1f42271bdb4de110465908b4f39619fa
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="WorkJam New User Request (external)">b96f9f17db4de110465908b4f396195d</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate WorkJam Requestor Info V4</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
				
	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var userId        = g_user.userID;
	var userName      = g_user.userName;
	var userFirstName = g_user.firstName;
	var userLastName  = g_user.lastName;
	var userEmail     = g_user.email;
	
	var userInfoGa = new GlideAjax('global.scAjaxUtil');
	userInfoGa.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getUserInfoPayload');
	userInfoGa.addParam('user_sys_id', userId);
	userInfoGa.getXML(response_parse);
	
	function response_parse(response) {
		var answer      = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
		//alert("PHW: " + answer);
		var userPyldObj = JSON.parse(answer);
		
		//g_form.showFieldMsg("requestor_name", userPyldObj['location'], info);
		
		g_form.setValue('requestor_name', userPyldObj['first_name'] + " " + userPyldObj['last_name']);
		//g_form.setValue('requested_for', userPyldObj['first_name'] + " " + userPyldObj['last_name']);
		//g_form.setValue('requested_for_email', userPyldObj['email']);
		g_form.setValue('position_type', userPyldObj['location']);
		
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Paulus.Wongko@api.net.au</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-21 23:57:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1f42271bdb4de110465908b4f39619fa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate WorkJam Requestor Info V4</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="WorkJam" source="x_aupi_workjam">cc6a5678db6ca110465908b4f3961988</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="WorkJam">cc6a5678db6ca110465908b4f3961988</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_1f42271bdb4de110465908b4f39619fa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Paulus.Wongko@api.net.au</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-22 00:00:03</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
